entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High 13.

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of showers before morning. Risk of freezing rain over northern sections before morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:42 AM CDT Thursday 05 May 2016
